str2: Probably from the same as pale; anew, i.e. back, once more, or furthermore or on the other hand.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: A primary verb; to 'grave', especially to write; figuratively, to describe.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Fresh, new, unused, novel. Of uncertain affinity; new
An ordinance, injunction, command, law. From entellomai; injunction, i.e. An authoritative prescription.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Unconcealed, true, true in fact, worthy of credit, truthful. TRUE.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
And, even, also, namely.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Darkness; fig: spiritual darkness. From skotos; dimness, obscurity.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To pass by, depart, pass away. From para and ago; to lead near, i.e. to go along or away.
And, even, also, namely.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
True (lit: made of truth), real, genuine. From alethes; truthful.
Light, a source of light, radiance. From an obsolete phao; luminousness.
Already; now at length, now after all this waiting. Apparently from e and de; even now.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Prolongation for the base of phos; to lighten, i.e. Show.
